all.message: feat(basic): add semantic label for paragraph (#4157)

* feat(basic): add semantic label for paragraph

* feat(basic/binary-lifting, divide-and-conquer): add more labels from commit suggestion

all.message: fix(basic/merge-sort): 归并排序词条的改进 (#4076)
all.body:
* fix(basic/merge-sort): 归并排序词条的改进

对词条内容进行了重构，优化了表述，删除了冗杂部分，囿于自身水平未改动 Python 代码及外部链接。

* fix(basic/merge-sort.md): 代码对初学者更友好

鉴于归并排序较基础，将三目运算符改为了 `if` `else` 形式使其对初学者更友好

all.message: fix(basic/merge-sort): 修改伪代码的变量错误 (#3863)
fix(/docs/basicmerge-sort.md): fix an omitting of brackets
all.body: It is a wrong statement without a pair of brackets added
